summary: The diff implements several of the 15 requirements but leaves many partially or entirely unimplemented. Core infrastructure pieces (BackToHomeButton, PostDownloadNavigation, BatchFileQueue, useBatchProcessor, pageSizePresets, locale files, LanguageContext/Selector updates, BreadcrumbNavigation with JSON-LD, AIDocumentEnhancerPage, ProPricingModal update, HomePage Pro section, ImageToolsPage Pro section, App.tsx route) are present. However, most of the actual tool-page integrations are absent. REQ-154, REQ-155, REQ-156, REQ-159, REQ-160, REQ-164, and REQ-165 are either missing entirely or only partially covered.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add a 'Back to Home' button on every non-calculator tool page with left-arrow icon + 'Home' label, 44x44 px tap target, top-left above H1.
missing_requirements.reason: The BackToHomeButton component is created but the diff shows no evidence it is integrated into any individual existing tool page. Only AIDocumentEnhancerPage is confirmed to use it.

missing_requirements.requirement: BreadcrumbNavigation integrated on every non-calculator tool page with correct hierarchical path, positioned below Back to Home and above H1, with Schema.org JSON-LD.
missing_requirements.reason: BreadcrumbNavigation is updated with JSON-LD and used in AIDocumentEnhancerPage, but no evidence it was added to existing image tool, PDF tool, converter, or Resume Builder pages.

missing_requirements.requirement: Post-download navigation buttons appear after successful download on all non-calculator tool pages.
missing_requirements.reason: PostDownloadNavigation component is created but there is no evidence it was integrated into any existing tool page download flow.

missing_requirements.requirement: A4, Legal, and Letter page size presets labeled 'Office Print Ready' added to CustomImageResizePage, DPIChangerPage, ExportOptionsPanel, ImageToPDFTool, and PDFToImageTool with automatic DPI-based pixel dimension population.
missing_requirements.reason: The pageSizePresets library is created but there is no evidence the presets were integrated into any of the five specified tool components.

missing_requirements.requirement: Batch file processing for nine specified tool pages with queue list, per-file status indicators, and ZIP archive download.
missing_requirements.reason: useBatchProcessor and BatchFileQueue are created but not integrated into any of the nine specified tool pages. Additionally, the ZIP download is not truly implemented; the hook sequentially downloads files individually instead of creating a real ZIP archive.

missing_requirements.requirement: Enhance PDFAddWatermarkTool with six stamp settings fields, Apply and Preview flow, client-side processing.
missing_requirements.reason: No modification to frontend/src/components/pdf-tools/PDFAddWatermarkTool.tsx is present in the diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Full RTL layout support: Header, Footer, tool cards, form wizards, and breadcrumbs display correctly in Arabic RTL with Tailwind RTL utilities applied to flex/grid layouts.
missing_requirements.reason: LanguageContext sets dir='rtl' and index.css has basic CSS rules, but there is no evidence of Tailwind RTL utility classes applied to Header, Footer, tool cards, or form wizards. RTL support is partial.

missing_requirements.requirement: hreflang tags for all 19 languages in SEO component, x-default pointing to English, sitemap.xml with language URL variants, language-prefixed routes in App.tsx for 9 new languages.
missing_requirements.reason: No modification to SEO.tsx, generateSitemap.ts, or public/sitemap.xml is present. App.tsx does not show language-prefixed routes for the 9 new languages.

missing_requirements.requirement: Language auto-detection updates the URL to a language-prefixed variant; localStorage persists preference; no redirect if manual preference already stored.
missing_requirements.reason: LanguageContext has browser detection and localStorage logic but does not update the URL to a language-prefixed path. App.tsx does not implement language-prefixed routing required for URL updates.

missing_requirements.requirement: All 16 PDF tool components upgraded to use AdvancedToolShell with settings then Apply and Preview then download-enabled sequence and specific per-tool settings panels.
missing_requirements.reason: No modifications to any of the 16 PDF tool components in frontend/src/components/pdf-tools/ are present in the diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Back to Home button full-width below 480px, breadcrumbs truncate on small screens, post-download buttons full-width min-height 48px on mobile, batch queue stacks vertically below 768px.
missing_requirements.reason: BackToHomeButton uses sm breakpoint (640px) instead of the required 480px for full-width. Components are not integrated into tool pages so mobile responsiveness cannot be verified in context.

hallucinated_features.description: BackToHomeButton renders both an ArrowLeft icon AND a Home icon before the 'Home' label, showing two icons.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-151 specifies only a left-arrow icon followed by the label 'Home'. A separate Home icon was not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: useBatchProcessor's downloadAllAsZip sequentially downloads individual files instead of creating a real ZIP archive.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-155 explicitly requires downloading all processed files as a ZIP archive using JSZip or an equivalent. No real ZIP is created.
